title: Riot why don't you care more about trollers
body: I've had 3 games in a row with trollers and feeder. And no matter how many times i report them they dont get fucken banned. Its ridiculous. You have even taken away the option 'Trolling' from your report menu. I just would like a normal league game with normal teamate that say running down mid is the new meta. I dont know what you really can do but this is really getting ridiculous. I've gotten so tilted just because 1 guy is trolling that it brought me down to b5 and i dont really know what to do. Trollers are ruining league #stoptrolling

replies.body:
its bronze, riot or anyone else in any other elo bracket doesn't give a fuck about bronze my man.

i've seen multiple cases of feeders having at least 50 games of 20-40 deaths in each game before they even picked up on. one very recently posted here on the forum.

every promo series to date i have had a troll throw the at least 1 of the 3, sometimes 2 games for me.
Then how tf do i get out of elo hell then man. Do i just play norms for the rest of my life. Like I carry most of my games but we still end up losing
Maybe play a champion who can 1v5 if they get fed enough? I don't know. I'm quite content in bronze since it's probably the most hilarious elo.
best to have a screen shot and send in a ticket. They usually take action from that. Most effective way to get them banned.
